3i Infrastructure plc, a closed-ended investment company, has completed the acquisition of the remaining 50% stake in ESVAGT A/S, an offshore vessels owner and operator, from AMP Capital Investors Limited, a private equity firm, for a purchase consideration of £268 million

ESVAGT is a service operation vessels (SOVs) owner and operator in the North Sea supporting the offshore wind and oil & gas industries

Deal In Brief

Following the transaction, 3i Infrastructure holds 100% stake in ESVAGT

Richard Laing, Chair of 3i Infrastructure, said, "ESVAGT's transition into a market leader in European offshore wind has been a major achievement. We believe that it is well-placed to benefit from continuing attractive growth prospects in the wind sector and we are delighted to be acquiring 100% of the business." Deal history Announced: On December 3, 2021, 3i Infrastructure has agreed to acquire the remaining 50% stake in ESVAGT from AMP Capital for approximately £268 million.

Deal Value (US$ Million)356.46
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategorySecondary Buy-out
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-02-01

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Esvagt AS
Vendor (Company)AMP Capital Investors Limited

Deal Rationale

The transaction will enable 3i Infrastructure to strengthen its investment portfolio.
